source.name: Lean Government - Department of Transportation
source.description: Lean is a compilation of world class practices that aims to reduce the activities in a process until only the minimum amount is left. Lean principles and tools are used to eliminate wasteful activities that do not add value to the customer so that a process does more with less. Lean principles, methods, and tools encourage employee creativity, innovation, and problem-solving. Benefits from this method include lower costs and improvements to productivity, quality, and value.
